extension.description:
Trigger a Domoticz Scene based on Kodi (XBMC) events via a Domoticz Server. Create scenes in Domoticz and then configure the Domoticz server settings and assign scene numbers to player events. To reinstate changes in the Domoticz addon settings disable and then re-enable the Domoticz addon.
IMPORTANT: Disable/Enable after changing settings - or restart Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: This is a port of the Insteon Kodi addon - Cheers!
